name: Strawberry Basil Lemonade
description: Whether it's a lazy afternoon at the park or a backyard barbeque, this strawberry basil lemonade is sure to please everyone.
recipeIngredient: 1 cup (8 ounces) fresh squeezed juice from about 8 lemons
1 lemon, washed and sliced into 1/4-inch slices

recipeInstructions.text: Purée the strawberries with about 2 ounces of the lemon juice in a blender on high speed until smooth, about 1 minute. Strain the purée through a fine mesh strainer into a pitcher or large mason jar.
Add the remaining lemon juice, simple syrup, water, lemon slices and basil leaves. Gently stir until incorporated. Refrigerate for at least an hour before serving.
